test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:cons_not (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave)))) (:cons_not (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green) (sort Y closet)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X green) (sort Y desk)))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y bed))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X blue) (sort Y television))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y table))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X sofa))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X black) (sort Y desk))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X can) (color X yellow))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle)(color X green))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X blue) (sort Y refrigerator))) )
test.nl: The door of the refrigerator is closed. The door of the microwave is opened. Do not open the door of the microwave. Do not put the book which is green on closet. The green bottle must be on the desk. Put a can on the bed. Put the bottle which is blue on the television. Take out the remotecontrol from the cupboard. Put a book on the table. Go to the sofa. Put the black cup on the desk. Give the human a yellow can. Pick up the green bottle. Put the blue can in the refrigerator.
